languages.text: {n}Комиссар вещает пылко и решительно.{/n} "Вместе с моими отважными соратниками мы осуществляем саботаж деятельности наших врагов и разрабатываем план побега".
{n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."
languages.original_text: {n}Комиссар вещает пылко и решительно.{/n} "Вместе с моими отважными соратниками мы осуществляем саботаж деятельности наших врагов и разрабатываем план побега".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is ardent and decisive.{/n} "Together with my valorous comrades-in-arms, we sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}政委的答复热切而果断。{/n}“我和我英勇的战友们负责阻挠敌人的活动，同时制定逃跑计划。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}政委的答复热切而果断。{/n}“我和我英勇的战友们负责阻挠敌人的活动，同时制定逃跑计划。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}コミッサーは力強く、確固たる意志を持って話した。{/n}「私は勇敢な同胞とともに、脱出計画を企てながら敵の活動を妨害しています」
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}コミッサーは力強く、確固たる意志を持って話した。{/n}「私は勇敢な同胞とともに、脱出計画を企てながら敵の活動を妨害しています」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Las palabras del Comisario son vehementes y decisivas.{/n} «Mis valerosos camaradas y yo saboteamos las actividades del enemigo mientras preparamos nuestro plan de escape».
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras del Comisario son vehementes y decisivas.{/n} «Mis valerosos camaradas y yo saboteamos las actividades del enemigo mientras preparamos nuestro plan de escape».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

languages.text: {n}Bien que véhément, le commissaire ne s'embarrasse pas de fioritures dans son discours.{/n} « Mes valeureux camarades et moi-même sabotons les activités ennemies tout en cherchant un moyen de fuir cet endroit. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que véhément, le commissaire ne s'embarrasse pas de fioritures dans son discours.{/n} « Mes valeureux camarades et moi-même sabotons les activités ennemies tout en cherchant un moyen de fuir cet endroit. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Der Kommissar spricht bestimmt und entschlossen.{/n} "Meine tapferen Kameraden und ich sabotieren die Aktivitäten des Feindes, während wir gleichzeitig unsere Flucht planen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kommissar spricht bestimmt und entschlossen.{/n} "Meine tapferen Kameraden und ich sabotieren die Aktivitäten des Feindes, während wir gleichzeitig unsere Flucht planen."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Komiser, hararetli ve kararlı bir biçimde konuşuyor.{/n} "Cesur yoldaşlarımla birlikte düşman faaliyetlerini engellerken bir kaçış planı üzerinde çalışıyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}The Commissar's speech is vehement and decisive.{/n} "My valorous comrades and I sabotage the enemy's activities while we devise our plan of escape."

traits.locale_text: {n}Komiser, hararetli ve kararlı bir biçimde konuşuyor.{/n} "Cesur yoldaşlarımla birlikte düşman etkinliğini engellerken kaçış planımızı oluşturuyoruz."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
